Gadgeteer G. & N.E.R.D. CD Update From Tecmo US
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Shrine Topics (Disc & Encyclopedia): Gadgeteer G. & N.E.R.D. CD Update From Tecmo US
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, February 24, 2004 - 01:17 pm:

I called Brian at Tecmo to see if the listing for Gadgeteer G being made by In Search Of by N.E.R.D. was correct or a mistake of some sort. (There are other mistakes in the Tips & Tricks article.) He does recall buying the CD at Best Buy, and shipping it off to Japan to be used in the game. He does not recall any 'clean' version being on the shelf at the time. (Amazon.com lists an out of print clean version as having once existed.)

I have purchased two copies so far, each with slightly different stickers on them, both make Mogis.

Now, it is possible that Tecmo Japan simply did not use the CD to make a monster at all. I have asked Brian to look into the situation, however, this may take years to be resolved, if anything ever comes of it.

By Petit-Trot on Tuesday, February 24, 2004 - 04:16 pm:

Mine gives me a Battleleon (garu/durahan).
